MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the DG1 postcode area of Kirkmahoe and Amisfield. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 3:01pm. Our team have carried out on site investigations near the Amisfield Tower transformer and have located grounded overhead power lines. Due to the location of the fault and the extent of the damage and repairs required, our team are now working to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 9:00pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 4:34pm on Saturday 31st October 2020
